cards.question: Traduza: 'The project was successful despite the initial setbacks.'
cards.answer: O projeto foi bem-sucedido apesar dos contratempos iniciais.

cards.question: Traduza: 'It's high time we addressed the elephant in the room.'
cards.answer: Já passou da hora de abordarmos o problema óbvio que ninguém quer discutir.

cards.question: Complete: 'The outcome was contingent ____ the new funding.' (de/em)
Traduza: 'Her arguments were both cogent and persuasive.'
cards.answer: Os argumentos dela foram convincentes e persuasivos.

cards.question: Traduza: 'I'm afraid I can't quite grasp the gist of his lecture.'
cards.answer: Receio que não consiga captar a essência da palestra dele.

cards.question: Complete: 'He took a ____ leap of faith.' (grande/arriscado)
Traduza: 'The company needs to mitigate the risks associated with the expansion.'
cards.answer: A empresa precisa mitigar os riscos associados à expansão.

cards.question: Traduza: 'She has a knack for making people feel at ease.'
cards.answer: Ela tem um dom para fazer as pessoas se sentirem à vontade.

cards.question: Complete: 'The results were ____ far from being conclusive.' (muito)
Traduza: 'I was taken aback by his sudden outburst.'
cards.answer: Fiquei surpreso/perplexo com o desabafo repentino dele.

cards.question: Traduza: 'The underlying cause of the problem remains elusive.'
cards.answer: A causa subjacente do problema continua sendo difícil de identificar.

cards.question: Complete: 'We must abide ____ the rules of the organization.' (seguir/cumprir)
Traduza: 'The city's infrastructure is undergoing extensive renovation.'
cards.answer: A infraestrutura da cidade está passando por uma renovação extensiva.

cards.question: Traduza: 'He's always prone to exaggerating his achievements.'
cards.answer: Ele é sempre propenso a exagerar suas conquistas.

cards.question: Complete: 'The decision was made with the ____ of the board.' (consenso/acordo)
